topSchoolsTitle: Ngā Kura me ngā Whare Wānanga Runga
topSchoolsDescription: Kimihia ngā whare ako matua o Aotearoa. Tirohia ngā kura tino pai, ngā whare wānanga rongonui, me ngā taiao ako whakahirahira.
